message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.DB

The paper focuses on topic discovery in text corpora, which is a common task in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The approach described in the paper involves clustering sets of highly co-occurring words, which is a machine learning task that falls under the category of unsupervised learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the scalability of the approach, which suggests that it may involve techniques from distributed systems (cs.DS) and databases (cs.DB).
